page.title: 12Four Oaks- Entertainment.
page.content: On Friday, June 21st Mr Shelly came to see us.He is a member of the Inner Magic circle,Past President of the International Brotherhood of Magicians and of the British Magical Society.He was very clever at magic and tricks.He came because we found out that he lives in the area we are surveying so we wrote to invite him.He showed us a trick with cards.He had six to start with,threw three away,but still had six left!Another trick was to put some water in a beaker,put a piece of paper on top,then turn the beaker upside down,the water stayed in it.Then he cut some rope and made it join to gether again. His final trick was to drop a piece of blue tissue and when he picked it up it was a Union Jack! His number plate was MAG 11C. It nearly spells magic.
